title: US weighing in on Lebanon's next central bank chief in a bid to weaken Hezbollah
description: The US is weighing in with Lebanon's government on the selection of the country's next central bank governor in a bid to curtail corruption and illicit financing for armed group Hezbollah through Lebanon's banking system, five sources familiar with the issue said. The US is reviewing the profiles of...

title: Hedge Fund, PE Executives In Running For Lebanon Monetary Chief
description:
(Bloomberg) -- A private-equity specialist along with a senior lawyer and a hedge-fund manager are in the running to become Lebanon’s central-bank governor, a critical appointment needed to fix the troubled banking sector and its multi-billion dollar deficit.

It’s the first change of guard at the c...
